name: Abandoned 3D
description:
This is post-LD version of game Abandoned . It is in 3D and available for download only (no browser version), and has less levels.

CONTROLS

Arrows - move

X - whistle (call creature)

Z - attack (using creature's power)

DESCRIPTION

Abandoned in the dungeon, you've met mysterious creature. It is wounded and loses his life while moving. But it goes on your whistle and may blast your enemies with light.

And you need it to pass the exit light well.

So try to keep it alive.
